ta.title: தாமரை கோபுரத்திலிருந்து விழுந்து பள்ளி மாணவி இறந்துவிடுகிறார்

en.title: Schoolgirl dies after falling from Lotus Tower

summary_lines: A schoolgirl died after falling from the Lotus Tower in Sri Lanka. The incident occurred during a field trip. Authorities are investigating the cause of the fall.
